name: Antispam Login Form
author: seosbg

sections.description:
Antispam Login Form WordPress plugin add sum field. Simply amazing and easy to use.
To learn more about the Antispam Login Form plugin please see Plugin URI. See screenshot examples at https://www.seosthemes.com/antispam-login-form/
sections.installation:
Install via Plugins > Install New

  1. Search for “Antispam Login Form”
  2. Click the “Install Now” link
  3. Click “Activate Plugin”

Via ZIP / FTP

  1. Unzip the ZIP file and drop the folder straight into your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is there a tutorial?

See the Tutorial

Where can I find documentation on the plugin?

Refer the Plugin Site
